content: well said , opposites can sometimes work better than similars and the key to any relationship having real longevity is having more gratitude for what is there than frustration for what is not there. We are opposites too although not in the way you suggest here and we are more in love than when we met and got together 20 yrs ago, life and love just gets deeper and better by the day when you truly value and allow the other to be who they are, like you say — there are positive outcomes in every approach and a balance is what is needed
